sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { ProductConsumer } from "../../context" export default function CartItem({item,value}) { const {id,title,img,price,total,count} = item const { increment , decrement , removeItem } = value return (
product: {title}
product: {price}
value.decrement(id) }> - {count} value.increment(id) }> +
removeItem(id)} >
item total : ${total}
) }
